title: Bug 23787[Properties dialog] Project Properties Info page should not use text fields
description: Bug 23787[Properties dialog] Project PropertiesInfo page should not use text fields Integration build 09/17. Looks bad on all motif platforms.
OB: On motif platforms, the Project Properties Info page displays text fields. These text fields have automatic borders, indicating that they are user input targets. In addition, on Solaris/AIX/HPUX platforms, the text fields have different colored backgrounds that make them stand out even more.
EB: The Project Properties Info page on all motif platforms should display the fields as readonly Text fields instead of using text fields. The values in these fields can still be selected and copied by the user if needed.
SR: To reproduce this issue, navigate to the Project Properties Info page on any motif platform. Observe that the fields are displayed as text fields with automatic borders and different colored backgrounds on Solaris/AIX/HPUX platforms.
